problem.markdown: Which of the below are true? [] A good parallel program executes processes one at a time. [x] For three parallel processes, there is a theoretical maximum speedup of 3x. [x] One challenge of parallel processing is reducing overhead [] All algorithms can be parallelized
problem.p: Which of the below are true?

checkboxgroup.choice: A good parallel program executes processes one at a time.
For three parallel processes, there is a theoretical maximum speedup of 3x.
One challenge of parallel processing is reducing overhead
